alert.note: Alert for Northwest Blue Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 8:22PM PDT until April 02 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM FRIDAY TO 5 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Friday to 5 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
